messages.title: ONLY LABOUR CAN BEAT THE SNP HERE
messages.content: Boris Johnson and his Brexit deal are the biggest threat to the future of the UK. Only Labour is presenting a positive case for a better and stronger Scotland within the UK. Labour offers an alternative to SNP mismanagement with a fully costed plan to invest in our economy and our public services such as the NHS, social care, schools and colleges.

messages.title: It's time for real change. When Labour wins, Scotland wins.
messages.content: Labour is clear - there will be no pacts, no coalitions with the SNP or any other party. We oppose independence, the last thing Scotland needs is an undesired and unnecessary independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give around 700,000 people in Scotland a pay rise by introducing a Real Living Wage of £10 an hour
Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need
Tackle Scotland’s housing crisis and end homelessness by building 120,000 new council and social houses, creating at least 50,000 jobs
Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs
Deliver £70 billion of additional funding to invest in Scotland’s people, communities and public services
End fuel poverty by investing £6 billion to retrofit every home to make them warm and energy efficient, creating at least 35,000 jobs

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY LABOUR CAN BEAT THE SNP HERE
